Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, interior grooved, with faint traces of red-brown-painted Arabic text on either side.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393116) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393116)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Arab. 1 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
